These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

column1: Do you want to let users view articles? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let users view articles? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: Yes, allow members to view all articles, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow members to view all articles, even private ones.

column1: Yes, allow members to view articles.
column2: Yes, allow members to view articles.

column1: No, do not allow articles to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow articles to be viewed.

Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their article. These options appear on your users' "Add Article" and "Edit Article" pages. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view articles.
